item.title: Power BI Developer for Custom Data Analytics System - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced Power BI developer to create a web-based data analytics system that will calculate profit and loss based on our revenue and expense data. The system will be hosted on the Power BI service, accessible through a secure web login. Revenue data will be sourced from our ERP system's SQL database, while expense data will be pulled from a live Google Sheet. Both data sets contain multiple categories that need to be integrated into the system.
The project involves developing an interactive Power BI dashboard that allows users to filter by platforms and other criteria, dynamically calculating and displaying profit and loss. The dashboard must be user-friendly, with clear visualizations and insights.
Candidates should have proven experience with Power BI, including data integration, dashboard creation, and hosting on the Power BI web service. Experience with SQL databases and Google Sheets integration is essential, as well as a strong understanding of financial data, particularly profit and loss calculations.
Please submit examples of similar Power BI projects you have completed, with a brief overview of your approach. Only proposals from developers with relevant experience will be considered. If you haven't worked on a similar type of project before, please do not apply.


Budget: $180

Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Dashboard, Report, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, SQL
Skills: Dashboard, Report, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, SQL
Country: Kuwait

https://altair-viz.github.io/gallery/seattle_weather_interactive.html

In the url, https://altair-viz.github.io/gallery/seattle_weather_interactive.html , there are range calculations. I need a range calculation automatically calculated from the LTP column .

LTP

Outcome

item.title: SharePoint, Power Automate and Power Apps Solution for Condominium Collections and Liens Process - Upwork
item.description:
For as long as I have been an attorney (since 2014), I have only done work on a pro-bono (volunteer) basis.  For the past several years I have been working with condominium associations, especially in regards to helping them with collections (especially filing liens).  It's an easy process but manual.  I think a lot of it can be streamlined and automated and I think SharePoint might be the best tool to do it.

I work with a few condo associations.  When they have an account that needs to go to collections, I would like them to upload the support (such as account statement, deed, collection attempts), and then have the System generate an "notice of intent to file a lien".  Interest and other calculations would need to be made (i.e. only amounts from the last 2 years can be filed for the lien, although the entire amount can be collected).  A "lien" document would also be generated and filed 30 days after the intention to file a lien if there is no response.

Ultimately, the site might also help prepare a foreclosure complaint or request for judgment on the lien.

Perceived Condominium Collection Solution Process
1. Condo Association is registered with the firm.  Intake provides key information related to collections, including:
a. Copy of bylaws
i. Need to know if collection can be made for entire calendar year when past due
ii. Amount of interest that can be charged, if noted
iii. Timing of notices for collection (15 days? 30?)
iv. Amount that can be collected on ($2,000 or more?)
b. Acknowledge and signature of a retainer agreement with Law Firm related to the collections (costs, scope of work, etc).

2. After being registered, a client submits collection action and enters key information about the request (name, address, unit number, etc)
a. Uploads support for the party name (deed)
b. Uploads support for the property tax id
c. Uploads and provides past due amount
i. Calculated amount due in past 2 years
d. Uploads evidence of condominium collection (if applicable)
i. 30 days past due
ii. 60 days past due
iii. 90 days past due
iv. notice of collection
e. Communication from debtor
f. Calculates interest charges due
g. Adds attorney fees
h. Adds court fees
3. System creates notice of intent to file lien
a. Notice of lien letter gets mailed out via certified mail
4. After appropriate time period (i.e. 15 or 30 days?), system creates lien
a. Lien gets created
5. System creates support for lawsuit
a. Support package gets prepared
6. System should be able to handle correspondence from debtors and the process could be ended if payment is made or a settlement is agreed to.



Posted On: August 11, 2024 03:22 UTC
Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft SharePoint Development, Office 365, Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft SharePoint Designer, Microsoft SharePoint Administration, Microsoft Windows PowerShell, Microsoft Power BI
Skills: Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft SharePoint Development, Office 365, Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft SharePoint Designer, Microsoft SharePoint Administration, Microsoft Windows PowerShell, Microsoft Power BI
Country: United States

item.description:
I am looking for an analyst on a part-time or full-time basis who can work many hours a week depending on availability and skillset (any time zone is fine)

You will be required to log on remotely to complete certain tasks. Time is required or we can switch to a per-milestone contract

MUST HAVE HIGH-SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION and at least 16GB Of RAM on the computer. Microsoft PowerBI installed

MUST BE WILLING TO VALIDATE WORK, it is not enough to write a formula and hope for the best

Looking for an experienced analyst
Examples of tasks:
-Create a report from SQL DB (MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle, Snowflake)
-Finding insights and drawing conclusions
- Statistical analysis using JMP|SAS| or other package
- Advanced knowledge of Python
-Creating reports or dashboards in PowerBI or PowerPoint
-Asking questions, and figuring out answers to problems by being proactive



NOT LOOKING FOR A DEVELOPER who JUST FOLLOWS ORDERS looking for someone who can provide solutions and ASK QUESTIONS.


40% of the time is spent analyzing data. It is not enough to create a measure or show a chart must dig into the data. What is the data telling us? these fields are blank is this ok? so many nulls is this right? etc.

40% asking the right questions in order to comprehend and create the business intelligence report. being innovative and condensing disparate pieces of data into actionable insights or succinct reports for senior executives. Proficient with PowerBI, Mcode, and DAX

20 % documentation to help translate business requirements to technical requirements

-Use current and emerging Statistics, Machine Learning and Data Science methods
Innovate new analytic solutions that serve unmet customer needs
communicate analytical results clearly and succinctly-

-Be creative, collaborative in nature, and a self-starter

PowerBI

item.title: Security-as-a-Service Platform Integration with OpenAI and Microsoft Data Fabric** - Upwork
item.description:
**Project Requirement: Security-as-a-Service Platform Integration with OpenAI and Microsoft Data Fabric**

**Objective:**  
We are developing a Security-as-a-Service platform that integrates our security framework with OpenAI’s GPT model for automated operations, managed via Slack, and connected to various security services using Microsoft’s Data Fabric (Azure Synapse, Azure Data Factory, etc.).

**Scope of Work:**

1. **Slack and GPT Integration:**
   - Integrate OpenAI’s GPT model with Slack to automate security tasks based on a variety of use cases (see examples below).
   - Set up Slack workflows to allow security consultants to interact with GPT for day-to-day security operations.

2. **Data Integration via Microsoft Data Fabric:**
   - Use Azure Synapse Analytics and Azure Data Factory to integrate data from various security tools (e.g., vulnerability scanners, incident management systems) into a unified data layer.
   - Ensure seamless data flow between the integrated tools and the GPT model to support real-time analysis and decision-making.

3. **Basic Dashboard Setup (Phase 1):**
   - Develop a simple, initial client-facing dashboard using Power BI or another tool to display key security metrics and actions taken.
   - This dashboard will provide clients with a basic overview of their security posture, with more advanced features planned for future phases.

**Example Use Cases:**

Here are a few examples of the types of use cases we envision for this platform. These examples are not exhaustive but illustrate the scope of the work:

1. **Incident Response Analysis:**
   - **Task:** GPT analyzes incident reports, identifies key findings, categorizes them by severity, and recommends actions. The summary is then shared via Slack.

2. **Vulnerability Management:**
   - **Task:** GPT reviews and prioritizes vulnerabilities based on severity and recommends remediation actions. The prioritized list is shared via Slack.

3. **Security Awareness Communication:**
   - **Task:** GPT drafts security awareness messages or emails for employees based on new security policies or updates, ensuring effective communication of key practices.

**Deliverables:**
- Working Slack-GPT integration with the above example use cases automated.
- Basic data integration setup using Microsoft Data Fabric, ensuring data from security tools is accessible for GPT analysis.
- An initial version of the client dashboard displaying essential security metrics.

**Additional Details:**
- We have a documented Security-as-a-Service framework that includes a broad set of use cases, action plans, and task frequencies, which will guide the implementation.
- This is the first phase of a potentially larger project, so we’re looking for a developer who can demonstrate capability in this initial stage, with the possibility of expanding the scope later.

**What We’re Looking For:**
- Experience with integrating AI models like GPT into platforms like Slack.
- Familiarity with Microsoft Azure services, particularly Synapse Analytics and Data Factory.
- Ability to set up basic dashboards using Power BI or similar tools.

**Budget:**  
We’re starting with a manageable budget to assess capabilities and ensure a good fit. Future work will be discussed based on the success of this initial phase.

item.title: Tableau Dashboard Development - Upwork
item.description:
We are a leading healthcare provider committed to delivering top-notch care and innovative solutions to improve patient outcomes. Our data-driven approach enables us to stay at the forefront of the industry, and we are looking for a talented Tableau Dashboard Developer to join our team. This role is crucial in helping us harness the power of data to make informed decisions that impact the lives of our patients.

**Job Description:**

We are seeking a skilled Tableau Dashboard Developer who is passionate about turning data into actionable insights. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining interactive Tableau dashboards that visualize complex healthcare data. You will work closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand their needs and deliver solutions that drive business decisions and improve patient care.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Design and develop interactive Tableau dashboards and reports that present healthcare data in a clear, actionable manner.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data analysts, healthcare professionals, and IT staff, to gather requirements and translate them into effective visualizations.
- Maintain and optimize existing Tableau dashboards, ensuring they are up-to-date and performing efficiently.
- Conduct data analysis to support decision-making and provide insights into patient care, operational efficiency, and other key metrics.
- Ensure data accuracy and integrity by validating and testing the dashboards regularly.
- Train and support end-users on Tableau best practices, helping them to effectively use the dashboards to meet their needs.
- Stay updated with the latest Tableau features and industry best practices to continuously improve the quality of deliverables.

**Qualifications:**

- Experience developing Tableau dashboards, preferably in the healthcare industry.
- Strong understanding of data visualization principles and best practices.
- Experience working with large datasets and optimizing dashboard performance.
- Familiarity with healthcare data sources and standards (e.g., EMR/EHR, HL7, HIPAA compliance) is a plus.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work collaboratively with non-technical stakeholders.
- Ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

item.title: Development of SharePoint-Embedded PowerApp Interface for PowerBI Dataset Reconciliation - Upwork
item.description:
Objective:
To develop a PowerApp embedded within SharePoint that enables users to reconcile two datasets sourced from a Power BI semantic model. The interface should be user-friendly and efficient.

Design and develop a PowerApp that can be embedded within a SharePoint site.
The app should allow users to select two datasets (see image attached to this brief) from the Power BI semantic model for reconciliation (cost classification/categorisation).
Provide a user interface for easy categorisation.

Data Integration:
Connect the PowerApp to the Power BI semantic model, ensuring real-time data access.
Implement mechanisms to fetch and display the datasets within the app.
Ensure that the data is up-to-date and consistent with the source.

Reconciliation Functionality:
Develop features that allow users to classify costs
Include options for filtering, sorting, and matching data based on various criteria.

User Interface (UI):
Design a clean, intuitive interface that aligns with a modern SharePoint site environment.

Performance Optimization:
Optimize the app for performance, ensuring it can handle large datasets without significant lag or load times.

Security:
Ensure that user access is controlled based on permissions within SharePoint and Power BI.

Note:
I am open to consider another technology than PowerApp, please suggest ideas but it need to be a solution I can be able to maintain myself in the future.

There will be other assignments like this for the right person.



Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00

Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Microsoft Power BI Development, Microsoft PowerApps, UX & UI Design

item.title: Web Analytics Specialist/Digital Analyst - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and detail-oriented Web Analytics Specialist/Digital Analyst to join a dynamic team and help optimize and grow the digital presence across multiple websites. The ideal candidate will have a passion for data-driven insights and a strong ability to translate complex analytics into actionable strategies.

Key Responsibilities:

• Monitor and analyze website traffic, user behavior, and conversion metrics using tools such as Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, and other web tracking tools.
• Generate comprehensive reports on website performance, identifying trends, issues, and opportunities for improvement.
• Collaborate with web development and marketing teams to implement data-driven strategies that enhance user experience and achieve business objectives.
• Develop and maintain dashboards and reporting tools to provide real-time insights to stakeholders.
• Conduct A/B testing and other experiments to optimize website elements and improve conversion rates.
• Provide actionable recommendations based on data analysis to improve SEO, content performance, and overall site efficiency.
• Stay up-to-date with the latest web analytics trends, tools, and best practices.

Qualifications:

• Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Marketing, Business, or a related field.
• 3+ years of experience in web analytics, digital marketing, or a similar role.
• Proficiency in web analytics tools such as Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, and Google Tag Manager.
• Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data sets and translate them into actionable insights.
• Experience with A/B testing and conversion rate optimization (CRO).
• Knowledge of SEO best practices and tools.
• Excellent communication skills, with the ability to present data and insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
• Strong attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
• Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) is a plus.


Hourly Range: $3.00
Posted On: August 09, 2024 16:32 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Data Visualization, Google Analytics, Analytics, Google Ads, Google Tag Manager, Search Engine Optimization
Skills: Data Visualization, Google Analytics, Analytics, Google Ads, Google Tag Manager, Search Engine Optimization
Country: United States

item.title: Tableau Developer to build Dashboards and ETL - Upwork
item.description:
Title: Tableau Developer Needed for Dashboard Creation

Description:

We are seeking an experienced Tableau Developer to assist in building insightful and user-friendly dashboards. You will work closely with our team to understand user requirements and translate them into effective data visualizations.

Key Responsibilities:

- Develop and design dashboards using Tableau based on provided data sources and requirements.
- Use ETL processes to integrate and prepare data for analysis.
- Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and define user needs and ensure they are met through the dashboard design.
- Utilize Tableau Prep Builder for data preparation and transformation tasks.
- Provide expert advice on visualization choices and Tableau features to improve user experience.
- Ensure dashboards are intuitive, effective, and visually appealing.

Requirements:

- Proven experience as a Tableau Developer.
- Strong communication skills to effectively gather requirements and convey ideas.
- Ability to translate user needs into practical, actionable dashboard designs.
- Proficiency in ETL processes and data engineering.
- Experience with Tableau Prep Builder.
Strong SQL skills.
- Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail.
- Availability to work 5 to 10 hours per week.

Preferred Skills:

- Familiarity with best practices in data visualization.
- Ability to provide innovative solutions to enhance user interaction and experience.

To apply, please include examples of your previous work with Tableau and specify your experience with ETL, Tableau Prep Builder, and SQL.

Skills:Dashboard, Tableau, SQL, Data Visualization, Business Intelligence, ETL, Data Engineering
